subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which ruler founded the city of Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर के संघर्ष किस ने किया ?
explanation_en: Sawai Jai Singh II, also known as Sawai Jai Singh, founded the city of Jaipur. He was a Rajput king and the builder of the city's iconic Amer Fort and Hawa Mahal.
